sense.name: not fighting
sense.commentary: harmonious relations, freedom from disputes - the state prevailing during the absence of war
sense.examples: The roommates lived together in peace. After six months in the woods George found himself at peace with nature.

sense.name: serenity
sense.commentary: peacefulness, peace of mind, repose, heartease, ataraxis - the absence of mental stress or anxiety
sense.examples: Her mind was at peace when she learned her husband was okay. The redundant nature of the phrase "Rest In Peace" made Sally chuckle during the funeral.

sense.name: public wellbeing
sense.commentary: the general security of public places (used almost exclusively in the phrase "disturbing the peace")
sense.examples: He was arrested for disturbing the peace.
